com.linecorp.armeria.client

Interface RemoteInvoker

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DecoratingRemoteInvoker, EndpointGroupInvoker, TracingRemoteInvoker

    public interface RemoteInvoker
extends AutoCloseable
    Performs a remote invocation to a URI.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes the underlying socket connection and releases its associated resources.
      <T> Future<T> invoke(EventLoop eventLoop, URI uri, ClientOptions options, ClientCodec codec, Method method, Object[] args)
      Performs a remote invocation to the specified URI.

    • Method Detail

      • invoke

        <T> Future<T> invoke(EventLoop eventLoop,
                     URI uri,
                     ClientOptions options,
                     ClientCodec codec,
                     Method method,
                     Object[] args)
              throws Exception
        Performs a remote invocation to the specified URI.
        Parameters:
        eventLoop - the EventLoop to perform the invocation
        uri - the URI of the server endpoint
        options - the ClientOptions
        codec - the ClientCodec
        method - the original Method that triggered the remote invocation
        args - the arguments of the remote invocation
        Returns:
        the Future that notifies the result of the remote invocation.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • close

        void close()
        Closes the underlying socket connection and releases its associated resources.
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
